tag_professor: Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Great Professor. Learned a ton! Be prepared for a reading quiz on the second day of class. I learned the hard way. Would highly recommend this professor she cares a ton about students. One of the best at Mount Mercy.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I took Ed Psych with Lisa and it was a very interesting class! You have to work really hard to get a good grade, but if you put forth the effort, you can get an A. Most students did not do well on her tests.
